title: How to Make Stuffed‐Crust Pizza

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 425° Fahrenheit (218° Celsius).
steps.description: Grease a 13 x 9 x 2 inch pan.

steps.headline: Unroll the dough out and press it on the pan.
steps.description: Leave a one-inch rim hanging over the edges of the pan.

steps.headline: Line up string cheese all around the edges of the pizza.
Fold up the sides and tuck them over top of the cheese.
steps.description: Press the sides to safely secure and hold in the string cheese.

steps.headline: Season the crust.
steps.description: Using a pastry brush, brush the melted butter all over the crust. Sprinkle your desired amount of parmesan cheese on it as well.

steps.headline: Spread the sauce, cheese, and pepperoni or other ingredients over the pizza.
Bake the pizza.
steps.description: Place the pan in the oven and have the pizza bake for about 15-18 minutes, until the crust is golden brown and cheese lightly melts.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Cut the pizza in slices and lay on a serving plate. Enjoy!

text: Preheat the oven to 425° Fahrenheit (218° Celsius). Grease a 13 x 9 x 2 inch pan. Unroll the dough out and press it on the pan. Leave a one-inch rim hanging over the edges of the pan. Line up string cheese all around the edges of the pizza.  Fold up the sides and tuck them over top of the cheese. Press the sides to safely secure and hold in the string cheese. Season the crust. Using a pastry brush, brush the melted butter all over the crust. Sprinkle your desired amount of parmesan cheese on it as well. Spread the sauce, cheese, and pepperoni or other ingredients over the pizza.  Bake the pizza. Place the pan in the oven and have the pizza bake for about 15-18 minutes, until the crust is golden brown and cheese lightly melts. Serve. Cut the pizza in slices and lay on a serving plate. Enjoy!
